alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 11:50AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT FAR WESTERN PORTIONS OF RIO BLANCO AND GARFIELD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow...Accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH...will rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile as it drift slowly southward. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1146 AM MST, a band of heavy snow was moving toward the Douglas Pass area at around 10 mph. Areas along Highway 139 over near Douglas Pass can expect rapidly changing conditions as the heavy snowfall moves in. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... Areas near and along Colorado 139 between mile markers 31 and 46. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
